title: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: Bug 101187Localization key can't be blank when adding. Description:If key is blank, externalized text can't be displayed in chart.Steps to reproduce:1.
OB: When the key in the properties file is left blank, but it has a valid value, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title even if the key is left blank in the properties file.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the properties file. 
2. Leave the key blank but assign a valid value to it. 
3. Generate a chart and observe if the externalized text is displayed in the chart title.
